data.name: Delicious Emily's Christmas Carol - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
You can now enjoy the complete soundtrack of Delicious - Emily's Christmas Carol! Feel the Christmas vibes all around you with the amazing cinematic music of Adam Gubman. It's the perfect music to listen to while you're decorating the Christmas tree, wrapping wonderful presents, or preparing a delicious dish! You'll be surprised by the beautiful new version of the Christmas classic 'Deck the Halls'. Enjoy listening!

Tracklist:


Delicious - Emily's Christmas Carol - Soundtrack

01. Deck the Halls, Delicious Style
02. Once Upon a Cold December
03. Emily's Winter Garden
04. Suddenly, A Mystery's Calling
05. Paige
06. Train Station
07. Magic Sprinkles
08. Train Ride
09. Christmas Star
10. Reindeer Farm
11. Little Angel, Always Present
12. Santa's Toy Shop
13. Finally!
14. Santa's House
15. Time Is Here to Join the Season
16. Emily's Hearth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows xp, vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 541 MB available space
